task.prompt: A small theater company sells tickets to a show.  They have a 400 seat theater and fill to 80% capacity.  Each ticket cost $30.  They repeated the same performance 2 other days.  How much did they make?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: A small theater company sells tickets to a show.  They have a 400 seat theater and fill to 80% capacity.  Each ticket cost $30.  They repeated the same performance 2 other days.  How much did they make?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
